comments.body: I think it's worth discussing briefly how cross-zone load balancing will work.  I believe that it "just works" due to both GCE and AWS regional load balancing, but that fact is conspicuously absent from this design, and should be added.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +61,65 @@1. pods which require volumes should not be scheduled onto nodes in a different zone.
1. load-balanced services should work reasonably

### kube-up support
